metadata.title: CVE-2024-5430 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions startingfrom 16.10 prior to 16.11.5, starting from 17.0 prior to 17.0.3, andstarting from 17.1 prior to 17.1.1, which allows a project maintainer candelete the merge request approval policy via graphQL.

criterions.comment: gitlab package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
